featured.text: This higher water content also makes 23 easier for them to bruise.

definition.zh_def: 瘀傷；皮膚下的血液積聚，通常由撞擊或撞擊造成。
definition.en_def: A bruise is a discoloration of the skin caused by bleeding underneath, typically resulting from a blow or impact.
definition.example: She got a bruise on her arm after bumping into the door.
